oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The |u' ||ke'. or Tshaka, is a small plant and is used as part of the purification ritual, or |koa. It intoxicates and can kill people if handled incorrectly (at the wrong time of day), and is thus feared. The =nabbi does not kill people and is given when the people 'seek their hearts'. Both plants seem to be effective at specific times of day.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The |u' ||ke' or Tshaka
